entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
